TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MapArea extends System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartNamedElement implements class System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.IChartMapArea
Public Class MapArea Inherits ChartNamedElement Implements IChartMapArea

span.span: Represents a map area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表用戶端影像地圖，地圖區域，並對應至 HTML\<區域 > 標記。The class represents a map area of a client-side image map, and corresponds to an HTML \ tag. 物件會儲存在類別。The objects are stored in the class. 物件分為兩種類型：There are two types of objects: - 對應的圖表項目時，自動建立的區域 — 比方說，資料點、 序列、 圖例項目或帶狀線物件 — 具有非空白`ToolTip`，`Url`或`MapAreaAttributes`屬性; 請注意所需的其他 HTML 項目也會建立用戶端影像對應。Map areas that are automatically created when a chart element—for example, a data point, series, legend item or strip line object—has a non-empty `ToolTip`, `Url` or `MapAreaAttributes` property; note that other HTML elements that are required for a client-side image map are also created. 在此情況下，維度和對應區域的位置會自動決定圖表元素。In this case, the dimensions and location of a map area are automatically determined by the chart element. 使用根的事件物件才能刪除或修改這些對應區域在執行階段。Use the event of the root object to delete or modify these map areas at run time. - 具有使用者定義的形狀和座標的自訂對應區域。Custom map areas that have a user-defined shape and coordinates. 使用屬性在設計階段將這些自訂對應區域，或執行階段物件。Use the property of the object to add these custom map areas at design time or run time. 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**來建立映像對應使用先前所述物件屬性物件必須設為。**Important** To create an image map using the previously described objects, the property of the object must be set to . 可建立影像地圖，當使用二進位資料流，但必須使用另一種技術。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 自訂物件屬性會決定圖形，而屬性會決定在地圖區域的位置。For custom objects, the property determines the shape, and the property determines the location of the map area. 工具提示，超連結或屬性，例如目標 = _Blank 或 OnClick="javascript:MyJavaScriptFunction()"，您可以將針對的所有地圖區域。Tooltips, hyperlinks, or attributes, such as Target=_Blank or OnClick="javascript:MyJavaScriptFunction()", can be set for all map areas. 使用屬性來判斷是否對應區域是自訂物件; 也就是說，它有使用者定義形狀和座標。Use the property to determine whether a map area is a custom object; that is, whether it has user-defined shape and coordinates.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式可以用來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。This constructor can be used to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 不過，更簡單的方法來建立自訂物件是使用其中一個多載`Add`或`Insert`方法類別。However, an easier way to create a custom object is to use one of the overloaded `Add` or `Insert` methods of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public float[] Coordinates { get; set; }
.property instance float32[] Coordinates

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的座標。

span.span: Gets or sets the coordinates of a object.

value.span: 座標陣列，相依於對應區域的圖形。

span.span: An array of coordinates that is dependent on the shape of the map area.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性通常用來設定具有使用者定義的形狀和座標的自訂對應區域物件的座標。The property is usually used to set the coordinates of a custom map area object that has a user-defined shape and coordinates. 必須指定自訂對應區域的座標，取決於地圖區域的形狀：The coordinates that must be specified for a custom map area depend on the shape of the map area: - 圓形。Circle. 必須提供三個座標:"x1，y1，r"，其中"x 1，y2"是圓形的中心點的座標，而"r"是圓形的半徑。Three coordinates must be provided: "x1, y1, r", where "x1, y2" are the coordinates of the center of the circle, and "r" is the radius of the circle. - 矩形。Rectangle. 必須提供四個座標:"x1，y1，x2，y2，"where"x1，y1"是矩形和"x2，y2"的左上角的座標是矩形右下角的座標。Four coordinates must be provided: "x1, y1, x2, y2", where "x1, y1" are the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the rectangle and "x2, y2" are the coordinates of the lower-right corner of the rectangle. - 多邊形。Polygon. 兩個或多個 x 和 y 組必須提供"x1，y1，x2，y2...y2...xn，yn"，其中每個"x，y"配對包含一個多邊形頂點的座標。Two or more x and y pairs must be provided "x1, y1, x2, y2...xn, yn", where each "x, y" pair contains the coordinates of one vertex of the polygon. 當座標的設定，請使用相對座標系統的圖表，其中的圖表影像的左上角是"0，0"，而影像的右下角是"100,100"。When setting coordinates, use the relative coordinate system of the chart, where the top-left corner of the chart image is "0,0" and the bottom-right corner of the image is "100,100". 定義對應區域的形狀和座標後，及/或屬性可以用來指定特定的使用者互動。After the shape and coordinates are defined for the map area, the , and/or properties can be used to specify a particular user interaction. 請注意下列事項：Note the following: - 用戶端影像地圖，才會建立在執行階段屬性的根物件是`true`，預設值。A client-side image map will only be created at run time if the property of the root object is `true`, which is the default. - 若要建立影像對應加入物件加入至地圖的區域集合，屬性物件必須設為。To create an image map by adding a object to the map areas collection, the property of the object must be set to . 可建立影像地圖，當使用二進位資料流，但必須使用特殊的技術。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but a special technique must be used.

value.span: 如果為自訂對應區域，為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the map area is custom; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: public string MapAreaAttributes { get; set; }
.property instance string MapAreaAttributes
Public Property MapAreaAttributes As String
public: property System::String ^ MapAreaAttributes { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定對應區域的屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the attributes of the map area.

value.span: 值，表示對應於特定圖表項目的對應區域的屬性。

span.span: A value that represents the attributes of the map area that corresponds to a particular chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您設定此屬性，將會自動建立用戶端影像地圖，地圖區域將會建立具有屬性字串附加至\<對應 > 對應至標記正在設定此屬性的物件。If you set this property, a client-side image map will be automatically created, and a map area will be created with the attribute string appended to the \ tag that corresponds to the object that this property is being set for. 例如，設定目標屬性使用這個屬性與設定`Url`的第一個資料點的屬性會導致與下列類似的 HTML 程式碼：For example, setting the Target attribute using this property and setting the `Url` property of the first data point will result in HTML code that is similar to the following: \...\\\\...\\\ 因為整個字串會附加到\<對應 > 標記，應該以空格分隔多個屬性。Because the entire string is appended to the \ tag, multiple attributes should be separated with a space. 屬性可以用於搭配屬性來指定對應區域屬性，例如目標 = _Blank，作為用戶端事件處理常式，例如 OnClick="MyEvent()"。The property can be used in conjunction with the property to specify map area attributes such as Target= _Blank, as well as client-side event handlers such as OnClick="MyEvent()". 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**這種方式，建立影像地圖屬性物件必須設為。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可建立影像地圖，當使用二進位資料流，但必須使用另一種技術。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 當您設定這個屬性，可以使用特殊關鍵字。Special keywords can be used when you set this property. 每個關鍵字會被取代的資料適用的圖表項目從某個類型。Each keyword will be replaced with some type of data from the applicable chart element. 請參閱下表中的所有可用的關鍵字清單：Refer to the following table for a list of all available keywords: |關鍵字Keyword|被取代Replaced by| |-------------|-----------------| |#VALX#VALX|資料點的 X 值。X-value of the data point.| |#VAL，#VALY，#VALY2，#VALY3...#VAL, #VALY, #VALY2, #VALY3…|資料點的 Y 值。Y-values of the data point.| |#SER#SER|數列名稱。Series name.| |#LABEL#LABEL|資料點標籤。Data point label.| |#INDEX#INDEX|資料點索引。Data point index.| |#PERCENT#PERCENT|百分比的資料點的 Y 值。Percentage of the data point Y-value.| |#TOTAL#TOTAL|數列中的所有 Y 值的總計。Total of all Y-values in the series.| |#LEGENDTEXT#LEGENDTEXT|圖例文字。Legend text.| 若要建立使用者定義的座標的影像對應，請使用屬性的根物件。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreaShape Shape { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.Web.UI.DataVisualization.Charting.MapAreaShape Shape
Public Property Shape As MapAreaShape

public: property System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::MapAreaShape Shape { System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::MapAreaShape get(); void set(System::Web::UI::DataVisualization::Charting::MapAreaShape value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 物件的圖形。

span.span: Gets or sets the shape of a object.

value.span: 列舉值，決定對應區域物件的圖形。

span.span: A enumeration value that determines the shape of a map area object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性通常用來設定自訂對應區域，該物件具有使用者定義的形狀和座標的圖形。This property is usually used to set the shape of a custom map area object, which has a user-defined shape and coordinates. 自訂地圖區域的形狀會決定必須指定座標的類型，以及可用的圖形是圓形、 矩形和多邊形。The shape of the custom map area determines the type of coordinates that must be specified, and available shapes are circles, rectangles and polygons. 擷取的圖形時物件儲存在，任何不是一個矩形或圓形的圖形會被視為多邊形。When retrieving the shapes of objects that are stored in the , any shape that is not a rectangle or a circle will be considered a polygon. 例如，自訂對應區域可以加入至地圖區域集合使用做為參數，可讓要用的任何類型的物件。For example, a custom map area can be added to the map areas collection using a object as a parameter, which allows any type of shape to be used. 如果此特定屬性擷取物件時，它會傳回。If the property of this particular object is retrieved, it will return a . 在定義對應區域的座標與圖形後， ，及/或屬性可以用來指定特定的使用者互動。After the shape and coordinates of a map area are defined, the , and/or properties can be used to specify a particular user interaction. 請注意下列事項：Note the following: - 如果根圖表物件的 IsMapEnabled 屬性為 true 時，這是預設值，用戶端影像地圖只能建立在執行階段。A client-side image map will only be created at run-time if the IsMapEnabled property of the root Chart object is true, which is the default. - 若要建立映像將是 MapArea 物件加入至對應區域集合的圖表物件的 RenderType 屬性的對應必須 RenderType.ImageTag。To create an image map by adding a MapArea object to the map areas collection the RenderType property of the Chart object MUST be RenderType.ImageTag. 可建立影像地圖，當使用二進位資料流，但必須使用特殊的技術。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but a special technique must be used.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ToolTip { get; set; }

public: property System::String ^ ToolTip { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定對應區域的工具提示。

span.span: Gets or sets the tooltip for the map area.

value.span: 值，表示圖表項目的工具提示。

span.span: A value that represents the tooltip of the chart element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性會自動導致正在建立用戶端影像地圖和地圖區域將會建立具有 Title 屬性設定為指定的工具提示字串。Setting this property will automatically result in a client-side image map being created, and a map area will be created with the Title attribute set to the specified tooltip string. 對應區域將會使用對應到相關的圖表元素的維度。The map area will use the dimensions that correspond to the relevant chart element. 例如，如果屬性會設為資料點，則會在執行階段產生類似下列程式碼的 HTML 程式碼：For example, if the property is set for a data point, then HTML code similar to the following code will be generated at run time: \\\\\\ 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**這種方式，建立影像地圖屬性物件必須設為。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可建立影像地圖，當使用二進位資料流，但必須使用另一種技術。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 這個屬性可讓您設定要顯示不同類型的圖表相關資料的特殊關鍵字。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要建立使用者定義的座標的影像對應，請使用屬性的根物件。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Url { get; set; }
.property instance string Url
Public Property Url As String
public: property System::String ^ Url { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("System.Web.UI.Design.DataVisualization.Charting.UrlValueEditor, System.Web.DataVisualization.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=31bf3856ad364e35", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 取得或設定對應區域的目的 URL 或錨點。

span.span: Gets or sets the destination URL or anchor point of the map area.

value.span: 值，表示對應區域的目的 URL 或錨點。

span.span: A value that represents the destination URL or anchor point of the map area.

value.span: 若要使用絕對 URL，字串運算式的開頭請使用 "http://" 或 "www."。

span.span: To use an absolute URL, start the string expression with either "http://" or "www.".

value.span: 如果字串的開頭不是上述其中一個前置詞，則會將字串視為相對 URL。

span.span: If the string does not start with either of these prefixes, it will be treated as a relative URL.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 當您設定這個屬性時，將會自動建立用戶端影像地圖，並對應區域將會建立具有 HREF 屬性設定為指定的錨點或 URL。When you set this property, a client-side image map will automatically be created, and a map area will be created with the HREF attribute set to the specified anchor or URL. 此對應區域也會使用對應到相關的圖表元素的維度。This map area will also use the dimensions that correspond to the relevant chart element. 例如，如果 HREF 屬性設定為資料點，然後如下所示的 HTML 程式碼則會產生在執行階段：For example, if the HREF property is set for a data point, then HTML code similar to the following will be generated at run time: <img id="Chart1" USEMAP="#Chart1ImageMap" src="ChartPic_000002.jpg?6735e83b-f0cd-4225-8be4-047695a61040" border="0" />\
...\
<MAP NAME="Chart1ImageMap">\
<AREA SHAPE="rect" HREF="http://www.healthquotes.ca" COORDS= "69,120,106,309">\
</MAP><img id="Chart1" USEMAP="#Chart1ImageMap" src="ChartPic_000002.jpg?6735e83b-f0cd-4225-8be4-047695a61040" border="0" />\
...\
<MAP NAME="Chart1ImageMap">\
<AREA SHAPE="rect" HREF="http://www.healthquotes.ca" COORDS= "69,120,106,309">\
</MAP> 設定這個屬性會有任何作用，如果屬性設定為`false`。Setting this property will have no effect if the property is set to `false`. 預設值是 `true`。The default value is `true`. **重要**這種方式，建立影像地圖屬性物件必須設為。**Important** To create an image map in this manner, the property of the object must be set to . 可建立影像地圖，當使用二進位資料流，但必須使用另一種技術。It is possible to create an image map when using binary streaming, but another technique must be used. 地圖 box-decoration-break，例如目標 = 空白的屬性都可以指定使用屬性。Attributes of the map area(s), such as TARGET=-Blank, can be specified by using the property. 這個屬性可讓您設定要顯示不同類型的圖表相關資料的特殊關鍵字。This property allows you to set special keywords to display different types of chart-related data. 若要建立使用者定義的座標的影像對應，請使用屬性的根物件。To create image maps that have user-defined coordinates, use the property of the root object.
